item.title: 道明银行前分行员工在持续洗钱案中被起诉
item.description: 美国司法部已逮捕并指控另一名多伦多道明银行前雇员共谋洗钱，这是最新一起与该银行美国零售业务大规模合规失误有关的指控。【原文：The US Department of Justice has arrested and charged another former Toronto-Dominion Bank employee with conspiracy to launder money, the latest in a string of charges tied to the lender’s massive compliance failures at its American retail business.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉公司辩称瑞士贿赂案是一场不公正的 "十字军东征
item.description: Trafigura 集团的律师辩称，该集团面临的贿赂指控是瑞士检察官不公正 "讨伐 "的一部分，他们正在审查该行业主要中心的大宗商品交易行为。【原文：Lawyers for Trafigura Group argued that the bribery charges it faces are part of an unjust “crusade” by Swiss prosecutors who are scrutinizing commodity trading practices in a major hub for the industry.】

item.title: 特朗普关税风险激荡金银，纽约金银价格跳涨
item.description: 纽约黄金和白银期货溢价上涨，因为交易商们在权衡美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的全面关税措施中是否可能包括贵金属。【原文：Premiums for gold and silver futures in New York swelled as traders weighed the possibility of precious metals being included in sweeping tariff measures proposed by US President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 汉莎航空呼吁暂停与卡塔尔的欧盟航班协议
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）呼吁欧盟暂停与卡塔尔的双边航空协议，理由是对这个海湾国家的腐败指控。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG called on the European Union to suspend its bilateral aviation agreement with Qatar, citing corruption allegations against the Gulf state that also owns Qatar Airways.】

item.title: 官员称中国正敦促电动汽车公司投资南非
item.description: 中国正鼓励其电动汽车制造商到南非投资，以扩大两国之间的联系。【原文：China is encouraging its electrical vehicle manufacturers to invest in South Africa as it seeks to broaden ties between the two nations.】

item.title: 埃克森正在探索为数据中心提供低碳电源
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司正在为一家大型天然气发电厂配备碳捕集设备，努力为数据中心提供无排放电力。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is working to provide emission-free electricity to data centers by equipping a large natural gas-fired power plant with carbon-capture equipment.】

item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 西门子任命前耐世特首席执行官施耐德为董事会潜在主席
item.description: 西门子股份公司建议雀巢公司和费森尤斯公司前首席执行官马克-施耐德（Mark Schneider）加入其监事会，并计划随后担任主席。【原文：Siemens AG is proposing that Mark Schneider, former chief executive officer of Nestle SA and Fresenius SE, join its supervisory board with the plan of later becoming chairman.】

item.title: 谷歌推出更快的双子座人工智能模型，为代理提供动力
item.description:
公司预计人工智能助手将在网络上跟随用户

。【原文：

Company expects AI assistants will follow its users around the web

item.title: 消息称博世即将达成向 Triton 出售安防资产的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，罗伯特-博世公司（Robert Bosch GmbH）即将达成一项交易，将其部分安防系统业务出售给私募股权公司 Triton Partners，这家德国零部件供应商将继续削减其投资组合。【原文：Robert Bosch GmbH is nearing a deal to sell some of its security systems operations to private equity firm Triton Partners, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German parts supplier continues to trim its portfolio.】

item.title: 星巴克将被黑客攻陷的调度应用程序恢复给供应商
item.description: 星巴克公司的员工工时记录系统已重新上线近三周，而此前该公司曾因供应商的黑客攻击而被迫手工记录工时。【原文：Starbucks Corp.’s system for logging employee hours is back online nearly three weeks after a vendor hack had forced the company to keep track of schedules by hand.】

item.title: 巴西利率飙升，新兴市场的热门交易变成 "灾难
item.description: 华尔街新兴市场策略师们最初的热门想法，如今却变成了今年最痛苦的交易之一。【原文：What started as a top idea among Wall Street emerging-market strategists has turned into one of the year’s most painful trades.】

item.title: Uber 警告纽约市对破产保险公司的回应暴露了司机的身份
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）要求纽约市出租车监管机构重新考虑对商业汽车保险要求的拟议修改，称这些修改可能会无意中导致该公司最大市场之一的数千名司机无法为自己的车辆投保。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is asking New York City’s taxi regulator to reconsider proposed changes to commercial auto insurance requirements, saying they may unintentionally leave thousands of drivers in one of the company’s largest markets unable to insure their vehicles.】

item.title: 英伟达就股东诉讼提起的上诉被最高法院驳回
item.description: 美国最高法院驳回了英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的上诉，使其不得不面对指控该公司在市场崩盘前误导股东关于其依赖加密货币采矿收入的诉讼。【原文：The US Supreme Court dismissed an appeal by Nvidia Corp., leaving it to face a lawsuit that accuses the company of misleading shareholders about its reliance on crypto-mining revenue in the run-up to a market crash.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调半个百分点至 3.25%，希望放缓步伐
item.description: 加拿大央行连续第二次大幅降息，表明决策者准备放缓货币宽松政策。【原文：The Bank of Canada made its second straight outsize cut in interest rates and signaled policymakers are ready to slow down monetary easing.】

item.title: 消息称苹果正与博通合作开发人工智能芯片
item.description: 据《信息报》援引一位直接了解该项目的人士的话报道，苹果公司正在开发一款专为人工智能设计的服务器芯片，并与博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. is developing a server chip designed especially for artificial intelligence and is working with Broadcom Inc. on the chip’s networking technology, the Information reported, citing a person with direct knowledge of the project.】

item.title: 南非零售销售出人意料，飙升至两年新高
item.description: 10 月份，南非的零售额出人意料地达到了两年多来的最高水平，而且预计还会继续增长，这对经济来说是个好兆头。【原文：South African retail sales unexpectedly galloped to their highest level in more than two-years in October and are excepted to continue to advance, boding well for the economy.】

item.title: 阿波罗首席执行官罗文认为更大的私人巨额交易即将到来
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）说，他预计，在更有利于企业的监管环境和投资者需求不断增长的情况下，私人信贷提供商明年可能会进行更大规模的交易。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan said he expects larger mega-deals from private credit providers could happen in the coming year amid a more business-friendly regulatory environment and growing investor demand.】

item.title: 以下是美国 11 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周三公布的 11 月份美国消费者价格指数报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the November US consumer price index report released Wednesday:】

item.title: Match 集团下调收入预期，推出分红计划
item.description: Match Group Inc.周三下调了第四季度的两项营收预期，令一直期待这家约会应用公司出现转机的投资者大失所望。【原文：Match Group Inc. lowered two of its fourth-quarter revenue forecasts on Wednesday, disappointing investors who have been waiting for a turnaround at the dating app company.】

item.title: 华为新款 Mate 70 手机显示其芯片进展停滞不前
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.）的最新旗舰智能手机采用的芯片与一年前在华盛顿敲响警钟的芯片差别不大，这预示着这家中国公司的技术进步正在放缓。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s latest flagship smartphone is powered by a chip little different from the one that set off alarm bells in Washington a year ago, signaling a slowdown in the Chinese company’s tech advances.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储本月减息，国债上涨
item.description: 在一份报告显示上月消费者物价加速上涨符合预期后，美国国债上涨，交易商也提高了对美联储本月降息的押注。【原文：US Treasuries gained and traders boosted their bets on a Federal Reserve interest-rate reduction this month after a report showed consumer prices last month accelerated in line with expectations.】

item.title: 前桑坦德银行家利用人工智能发现可再生能源交易
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）的一名前银行家创建了一个基于人工智能的工具，帮助投资者寻找可再生能源项目，为其提供融资或购买。【原文：A former Banco Santander SA banker created an artificial intelligence-based tool to help investors find renewable energy projects to either finance or buy.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀保持坚挺，连续第四年增长 0.3
item.description: 美国消费者价格在 11 月份继续上涨，其速度加剧了人们对抑制通胀的进展停滞不前的担忧。【原文：US consumer prices continued to rise in November at a pace that is fueling concerns the progress toward taming inflation is stalling.】

item.title: 据说德国将聘请罗斯柴尔德为德国商业银行提供顾问服务
item.description: 德国已聘请 Rothschild & Co.为其剩余的德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）股份提供咨询，此前德国在 9 月份进行的部分出售因允许意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）插手而受到广泛批评。【原文：Germany has hired Rothschild & Co. to advise on its remaining Commerzbank AG stake, after a partial sale in September was widely criticized for allowing Italian rival UniCredit SpA to swoop in.】

item.title: 智利铜生产商就联合冶炼厂事宜展开会谈
item.description: 据知情人士透露，智利两家国有铜业公司 Codelco 和 Enami 正在讨论将各自的冶炼产能合并为一个项目的可能性。【原文：Codelco and Enami, Chile’s two state copper companies, are discussing the possibility of combining their respective efforts to expand smelting capacity into a single project, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Mobileye 与 Innoviz 合作为自动驾驶系统提供激光雷达
item.description: Mobileye Global Inc.将在其向汽车制造商提供的自动驾驶系统中使用 Innoviz Technologies Ltd.生产的激光传感器，这可能会增加该公司的收入，因为它正寻求通过更广泛地部署自动驾驶汽车来实现盈利。【原文：Mobileye Global Inc. will use laser sensors made by Innoviz Technologies Ltd. for its autonomous driving system it supplies to vehicle manufacturers, a potential revenue boost for the upstart as it seeks to become profitable through wider deployment of self-driving vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普以豁免权为由赢得 "社会协议真相 "诉讼延期
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得了一项法庭命令，中止其社交媒体平台联合创始人对他提起的诉讼，以便特拉华州法官权衡总统豁免权是否适用于此案。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump won a court order halting a lawsuit against him by the co-founders of his social media platform so a Delaware judge can weigh whether presidential immunity applies to the case.】

item.title: 泰森拳赛之后，杰克-保罗的 W 系列产品扩展到 H-E-B、克罗格超市
item.description: YouTube 明星杰克-保罗（Jake Paul）刚刚在 Netflix 上与前拳王迈克-泰森（Mike Tyson）进行了一场广受关注的拳击比赛，明年年初，他将把自己的 W 美容产品推广到 H-E-B 和 Kroger 连锁杂货店以及亚马逊网站。【原文：Fresh off his widely watched fight on Netflix with former boxing champ Mike Tyson, YouTube star Jake Paul is expanding his W grooming products early next year to the H-E-B and Kroger grocery chains, along with Amazon.com.】

item.title: 布林肯前往中东，美国寻求在叙利亚未来中发挥作用
item.description: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）将重返中东，拜登政府正试图在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前控制叙利亚正在发生的混乱局面。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken is heading back to the Middle East as the Biden administration tries to shape the unfolding chaos in Syria before Donald Trump returns to the White House.】
